details:
A vulnerability was discovered in lasso, a library for Liberty Alliance
and SAML protocols, which results to a improper verification of a
cryptographic signature.


For Debian 9 stretch, this problem has been fixed in version
2.5.0-5+deb9u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your lasso packages.


For the detailed security status of lasso please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/lasso>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
